item.title: The Allegations Against Timothy Busfield Explained
item.description:
Actor and director Timothy Busfield was indicted in early 2026 in New Mexico on multiple counts of criminal sexual contact with a child, stemming from allegations involving two young boys who were child actors on a series he directed. Prosecutors say the alleged conduct occurred between 2022 and 2024, but Busfield denies the accusations and has not been convicted.
The indictment followed a criminal complaint and an arrest warrant issued by Albuquerque authorities, which included counts of child abuse in addition to the sexual contact charges. A judge initially ordered him held without bond pending further hearings before he was later released on his own recognizance.
